microsoft/mssql-python

Python driver for SQL Server

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • SQLModel for Python apps, combines SQLAlchemy and Pydantic for working with databases
  • Pentesting tool for MSSQL servers
  • Maps SQL results to Python objects
  • parse and convert SQL between dialects in Python
  • Data transformation framework for SQL and Python
  • Blends SQL with LLMs for data queries
  • Terminal interface for SQL databases
  • Universal command-line interface for SQL databases
  • AI/sql platform for running and serving models from databases and apps
